experiences.description: Navro simplifies global payments for businesses by offering access to premier payment services worldwide through a single contract and API.
experiences.roleDescription: Joined as the first in-house designer and transitioned the design function from a consultancy model to a permanent team, establishing foundational processes and adopting research methodologies for continuous discovery. Collaborating closely with Product and Engineering leadership, I helped deliver a full payments suite with complex workflows that comply with regulatory requirements across various regions, contributing to the company's growth from pre-seed to securing Series A investment.

experiences.description: Swell is a customizable, API-first e-commerce platform. It's headless architecture offers businesses the flexibility to operate multiple storefronts across various tech stacks.
experiences.roleDescription: I embraced a new challenge as a Product Manager, applying my e-commerce and product design expertise to develop a hosted storefronts solution featuring a no-code builder - a product aiming to unlock the full potential of the SMB customer segment for the business. I also contributed to increased conversions through the optimisation of the product onboarding.

experiences.description: Gaspard+Bruno is an independent creative company with offices in London and Lisbon, specializing in strategy, design, and engineering.
experiences.roleDescription: I helped shaping their product approach and played a key role in collaborations with high-profile clients such as Public.com, Off-White, and Browns Fashion (for Farfetch), helping transform the organisation from a small studio into the creative powerhouse it is today.
